welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tadley, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves domestic flights within the United Kingdom.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Upavon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the busiest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving a mix of long-haul and short-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used by a limited number of airlines for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used by British Airways and some other airlines for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a limited time allowance for non-premium users.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the terminal building.
